text: Harold Joseph "Happy" Hogan is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character is depicted usually as a supporting character in stories featuring Iron Man and is also the father of Teen Abomination. == In other media == Director Jon Favreau portrays the character in the Marvel Cinematic Universe movies Iron Man (2008), Iron Man 2 (2010), Iron Man 3 (2013), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Avengers: Endgame and Spider-Man: Far From Home (both 2019), and reprised his role in the third Spider-Man movie, Spider-Man: No Way Home (2021). Favreau also voices alternate reality versions of the character in the Disney+ animated series What If...? (2021). Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Happy Hogan (character)
